mapper.insert: insert into web_cooperation_pic (id, pic_pc, pic_mobile, order_id, create_time, update_time, co_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{coId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update web_cooperation_pic set pic_pc = #{picPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_mobile = #{picMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, co_id = #{coId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pic_pc, pic_mobile, order_id, create_time, update_time, co_id from web_cooperation_pic
select id, pic_pc, pic_mobile from web_cooperation_pic where co_id = #{coId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by order_id desc
